row.process:
!Generates an overview report :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.SNAPSHOT_COMPARE_COMMAND java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#snapshot-tool.jar" snapshot CompareFileSnapshot &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX

row.post_process:
:SET &checkForText# = "Result-File:*" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.RETRIEVE_LINE_BY_TEXT :PRINT "RESULT LINE: &UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" :IF STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#) > 13 : PRINT "RESULT_line: &UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" : PSET &UC4RB_COPMPARE_RESULT# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#,13) :ENDIF
:SET &checkForText# = "Result-Status: *" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.RETRIEVE_LINE_BY_TEXT :PRINT "RESULT LINE: &UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" :IF STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#) > 15 : PRINT "RESULT_line: &UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" : PSET &UC4RB_CONTENT_STATUS# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#,15) :ENDIF
